aboutAlternative.text: I am a good team player and also quick learner too.

positions.title: Android And Java Developer
positions.description:
- Develop for both backend (Restful webservice) and frontend (android).
- Involve in whole life cycle of software development including requirement analysis, coding and testing
and deployment.
- Collaborate with UX designers and other developers to develop cutting-edge applications.
- Experience in file handling, media control in Android
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services.
- Experienced in developing webservice RESTful APIs with Spring Framework and hibernate.
- Experienced in developing android application with both Java and Kotlin.
- Integrated Facebook, Google Play service, Google Map and other open source APIs within
applications.
- Experienced in publishing and updating applications on the Google Play Store.
- Familiarity with Git.
- Experienced in publish notification by Firebase Cloud Messaging, Rabbit MQ, Websockets
- Knowledge in Jenkins, Java Docker, Flyway Database Migration
- Knowledge in Angular Framework

…

- Design and develop for Social Network sharing application in Android.
- Strong knowledge of Android UI design, patterns and test practices.
- Implements, delegates and schedules work for project completion within target time.
